title: What is the cost of answering a question in Chegg of Chegg.com? - Quora

response.answer_text: It depends on which subject you choose to answer. Each subject has a different amount to be paid like for calculus, you will be paid ₹100 per question while fir civil engg. , The amount is ₹168 etc. So it depends on your choice of subject. After you have applied for the subject, the amount to be paid for that subject will be shown to you. Or you can merely mail to chegg and get the rates of different subjects.

Chegg pays its tutors different amounts for different type of subjects the amount of the questions are normally shown on the questions. For students there is no amount except for subscription and online tutor lessons. Students can view already solved questions from textbooks and already answered by experts. Free sources are also available online for students.
